title: A Dreamer's Tales
description: The first annotated edition of Lord Dunsany’s seminal fantasy work A Dreamer’s Tales. Experience first hand the realms of wonder that inspired Tolkien, H.P. Lovecraft, Ursula K. Le Guin and Gene Wolfe in this one of a kind short story collection.  Annotations and forward by James Portnow, the writer of Extra Credits, Extra Sci-fi and Extra History.
author: Lord Dunsany
